name: spinner Vs block
description:
CHARACTERISTICS OF THE GAME
- Spinner Vs block is free is an endless game
- Simple controls to play spinner Vs block
- Challenge your friends to beat your highest score in the world.


INSTRUCTIONS OF THE GAME

- spinner Vs blocks is a free game on hand spinner.
- Avoid obstacles and block walls on the way. If the snake spinner hits the block, enemies or obstacles, it will be destroyed.
- endless game. So try to focus more to expand your snake's fidget spinner.

HOW TO PLAY "Spinner Vs block":

- Touch the screen to slide the fidget spinner to left or right to avoid obstacles.
- Eat coin balls, on the way to enlarge the snake.
- If you lose all your points, the game is over !
